00020 #include "GridControlFileReaderTest.h"
00021 #include "GridControlFileReader.h"
00022 
00023 using namespace std;
00024 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_io;
00025 using namespace affymetrix_grid_control;
00026 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_utilities;
00027 
00028 #define TEST_FILE_NAME "../data/test.file.grc"
00029 
00030 CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE_REGISTRATION( GridControlFileReaderTest );
00031 
00032 void GridControlFileReaderTest::setUp()
00033 {
00034 }

00036 void GridControlFileReaderTest::tearDown()
00037 {
00038 }
00039 
00040 void GridControlFileReaderTest::testCreation()
00041 {
00042         GridControlFileReader *reader = new GridControlFileReader;
00043         CPPUNIT_ASSERT ( reader != NULL );
00044         delete reader;
00045 }
00046 
00047 void GridControlFileReaderTest::testRead()
00048 {
00049         GridControlFileReader reader;
00050         GridControlData data;
00051 
00052         reader.Read(TEST_FILE_NAME, data);
00053 
00054         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetRows() == 5);
00055         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetColumns() == 5);
00056         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetNumB1Probes() == 3);
00057         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetNumB2Probes() == 2);
00058         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetNumNSProbes() == 1);
00059 
00060         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetB1(0).x == 0);
00061         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetB1(0).y == 1);
00062         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetB1(1).x == 2);
00063         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetB1(1).y == 3);
00064         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetB1(2).x == 4);
00065         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetB1(2).y == 5);
00066 
00067         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetB2(0).x == 10);
00068         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetB2(0).y == 11);
00069         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetB2(1).x == 12);
00070         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetB2(1).y == 13);
00071 
00072         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetNS(0).x == 10);
00073         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetNS(0).y == 20);
00074 }
00075 
00076 void GridControlFileReaderTest::testRead_no_file()
00077 {
00078         GridControlFileReader reader;
00079         GridControlData data;
00080 
00081         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_THROW(reader.Read("no_file.grc", data), affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::FileNotFoundException);
00082 }
00083 
00084 void GridControlFileReaderTest::testRead_invalid_file_version()
00085 {
00086         GridControlFileReader reader;
00087         GridControlData data;
00088 
00089         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_THROW(reader.Read("../data/test.file.data_invalid_version", data), affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::InvalidVersionException);
00090 }
00091 
00092 void GridControlFileReaderTest::testRead_invalid_file_type()
00093 {
00094         GridControlFileReader reader;
00095         GridControlData data;
00096 
00097         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_THROW(reader.Read("../data/test.file.full_array_file", data), affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::InvalidFileTypeException);
00098 }
